1/* $NetBSD: json.h,v 1.2 2018/08/12 13:02:38 christos Exp $ */

14#ifndef ISC_JSON_H
15#define ISC_JSON_H 1
16
17#ifdef HAVE_JSON
18/*
19 * This file is here mostly to make it easy to add additional libjson header
20 * files as needed across all the users of this file. Rather than place
21 * these libjson includes in each file, one include makes it easy to handle
22 * the ifdef as well as adding the ability to add additional functions
23 * which may be useful.
24 */
25#ifdef HAVE_JSON_C
26/*
27 * We don't include <json-c/json.h> as the subsequent includes do not
28 * prefix the header file names with "json-c/" and using
29 * -I <prefix>/include/json-c results in too many filename collisions.
30 */
31#include <json-c/linkhash.h>
32#include <json-c/json_util.h>
33#include <json-c/json_object.h>
34#include <json-c/json_tokener.h>
35#include <json-c/json_object_iterator.h>
36#include <json-c/json_c_version.h>
37#else
38#include <json/json.h>
39#endif
40#endif
41
42#define ISC_JSON_RENDERCONFIG 0x00000001 /* render config data */
43#define ISC_JSON_RENDERSTATS 0x00000002 /* render stats */
44#define ISC_JSON_RENDERALL 0x000000ff /* render everything */
45
46#endif /* ISC_JSON_H */
47
